1.title: Animals
1.plot: This collection of kids' songs and cartoons from Super Simple features episodes from Mr. Monkey, Monkey Mechanic, Turn and Learn ABCs, Paper Puppet Playhouse and Pratfall and nursery rhymes from Super Simple Songs, including Let's Go To The Zoo, Alice The Camel and Yes, I Can.

2.title: Counting to 10
2.plot: In this installment we're practicing counting to 10 with some of your favorite kids' songs, shows, and cartoons from Super Simple. Sing along to 10 Little Sailboats, 10 Little Fingers, 10 In The Bed, 10 Little Dinosaurs, and 10 Little Fishies. And laugh along with episodes of Sing Along With Tobee, Carl's Car Wash, and Super Duper Ball Pit.

3.title: Space!
3.plot: Enjoy this collection of kids songs and cartoons about the sun, stars, and planets above. Featuring episodes from Captain Monsterica, The Bumble Nums, and Carl's Car Wash, and some of your favorite nursery rhymes including Mr. Golden Sun, and Twinkle Twinkle Little Star.

4.title: Cats and Dogs
4.plot: We are celebrating cats and dogs with this collection of kids songs and cartoons. Featuring episodes from Carl's Car Wash, Mr. Monkey, Monkey Mechanic, and some of your favorite kids songs and nursery rhymes including Wag Your Tail, I Have A Pet, Peekaboo and Sing Along With Tobee songs.

5.title: Art & Colors
5.plot: Enjoy this colorful collection of kids songs and cartoons featuring episodes from Mr. Monkey, Monkey Mechanic, Turn and Learn ABCs, Milo's World, Super Simple Draw and Pratfall. Also includes some of your favorite kids songs and nursery rhymes, The Shape Song and I See Something Blue.

6.title: Fruits & Vegetables
6.plot: Enjoy this yummy collection of cartoons and a kids song from Super Simple; featuring Mr. Monkey, Monkey Mechanic, The Bumble Nums, and the Do You Like Spaghetti Yogurt? kids song from Super Simple Songs. Let's eat.

7.title: Apples and Bananas
7.plot: Here is a delicious collection of kids songs and cartoons from Super Simple featuring your favorite fruit. This installment includes Carl's Car Wash and Pratfall, and the Super Simple Songs Apples and Bananas and Counting Bananas. Yum yum.

8.title: Music
8.plot: It's a Music edition of The Super Simple Show. Enjoy this collection of kids songs and cartoons about music and musical instruments. Featuring an episode from Milo's World and some of your favorite songs from Super Simple Songs.

9.title: Music and Dance
9.plot: It's the Super Simple Show. This installment of kids songs and cartoons is all about music and dance. Featuring an episode from the Bumble Nums, Turn and Learn ABCs, Sing Along With Tobee, and Pratfall.

10.title: Flying
10.plot: Fly away with The Super Simple Show. Enjoy this collection of kids shows about flying, featuring episodes from Carl's Car Wash, Turn and Learn ABCs, and Finley's Factory. Plus, the 10 Little Airplanes song from Super Simple Songs.

11.title: Flying Away
11.plot: Fly high with this collection of songs and cartoons from Super Simple: featuring episodes from the Bumble Nums, Pratfall, Turn and Learn ABCs, Super Simple Draw and Little Robin Redbreast from Super Simple Songs.

12.title: Delicious Treats
12.plot: Enjoy this delicious collection of cartoons for kids from Super Simple featuring your favorite yummy treats. This installment includes Mr. Monkey Mechanic, Carl's Car Wash, and Pratfall ABCs from Super Simple ABCs. Yum.

13.title: Birds
13.plot: Enjoy this bird-themed episode of The Super Simple Show. Featuring clips from Super Simple Draw, Turn and Learn ABCs, Sing Along With Tobee, and the "I Have A Pet" song from Super Simple Songs.

14.title: Ice Cream & Dessert
14.plot: Feast yours eyes on this mouth-watering collection of cartoons for kids featuring everyone's favorite yummy ice cream and desserts. This installment includes an episode of The Bumble Nums plus "The Ice Cream Song" and "Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream" from Super Simple Songs.

15.title: Birds 2
15.plot: Spread your wings and fly away with this bird-themed episode of The Super Simple Show. Featuring episodes from Mr. Monkey, Monkey Mechanic, Turn and Learn ABCs, Paper Puppet Playhouse, and the "Yes, I Can" song from Super Simple Songs.

16.title: Boats
16.plot: Sail away with The Super Simple Show. Enjoy this collection of kids shows about boats, featuring episodes from Captain Monsterica And The Purple Protector, and the 10 Little Sailboats and Row Row Row Your Boat kids songs from Super Simple Songs.

imdb.title: The Super Simple Show
plot: It's _The Super Simple Show_ (qv). Enjoy this collection of kids' songs and cartoons from Super Simple.::Skyship Entertainment Company
